document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Belabranta Villa (labeled 52) on Mendever Street.
document_data.name: Belabranta Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Belabranta Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Belabranta]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the northeast corner of where the [[Rough Road]] intersected [[Mendever Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained four separate buildings arranged around a central garden. Each building stood between three and five stories tall.
